entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
